sentence.Network_en: "It's corned beef and cabbage," said Malone. "Yuk," said Maureen.

sentence.Network_en: The local deli wouldn't even carry our corned beef.

sentence.Network_en: We sit down to a supper of corned - beef hash or some other modest fare.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们坐下来吃一顿咸牛肉或其他菜式素净的晚饭.
